_comment: Create an array of cars in the inventory.json file (see example structure). Put at least three cars in the array.

cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This car's name is Yoshi and it's so friendly!
a little dent in one side but a motor to die for
looks like a toaster. You know you want it.
